ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisRe-appointment of DARRYL PLECAS of Abbotsford, British Columbia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective October 30, 2012.
